import React from 'react' import { SendemailContexte } from './contexte/SendemailContext'; import { useContext } from 'react'; import sendEmail from './sendEmail'; const Form = () => { const { // objet, // setObjet, // firstname, // setFirstname, // lastname, // setLastname, // password, // setPassword, // email, setEmail, message, setMessage, // city, setCity, state, setState, zip, setZip donnees, setDonnees } = useContext(SendemailContexte); const handleChange = (e) => { // create the new state and set it setDonnees(prev => ({ ...prev, [e.target.name]: e.target.value })) e.preventDefault() } console.log(donnees) const onsubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() sendEmail(donnees.objet, donnees.firstname, donnees.lastname, donnees.email, donnees.password, donnees.city, donnees.state, donnees.zip, donnees.message); // setObjet(""); setFirstname(""); setLastname(""); setPassword(""); // setEmail(); setMessage("") // setCity(""); setState(""); setZip("") } return (

) } export default Form
